_source.title: Amigurumi Sam crochet pattern. Halloween character. Scary boy with burlap bag on head. Languages: English, Danish, German, French, Spanish
_source.description: THIS item is PATTERN ONLY! You will receive .PDF digital file with simple crochet description and crochet steps photos.Available languages: English, Danish, German, French, SpanishYou can sell items made from this pattern, provided that they are handmade by yourself and you give credit to the designer. Please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling: "Crochet pattern by @BlueRabbitToys - https://www.etsy.com/shop/BlueRabbitToys "Copyright 2020 of Blue Rabbit. All rights reserved. You are not allowed to sell this pattern. You are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form! You are not allowed to alter this pattern in any way and sell it as your own!About pattern:This pattern is made for those, who knows basics of amigurumi and how to sew the details together.This pattern is written in American terms: •	MR - Magic Ring•	sl  st  - Slip Stitch•	sc – Single Crochet•	hdc – Half Double Crochet•	dc – Double Crochet•	tc – treble Crochet•	invdec - Invisible Decrease•	inc – Increase•	 (...)xN – repeat all inside the parentheses N times•	FLO!  - crochet into the front loops only!Crochet in a spiral unless the pattern says otherwise.Approximate toy size -  19cm/7.5in Materials:•	Yarn of your choice. I used „Alize Cotton Gold” (100g/330m) and  „YarnArt Jeans” (50g/160m) sport yarn. 55% cotton 45% acrylic,  2-FINE. Both are very similar.•	Crochet hook. I used 1.9 mm metal hook, but it is smaller than size what is written on yarn label! Use which is better for you, but note that size of the toy depends on your yarn and hook choice! •	Stuffing •	Yarn Needle•	Scissors•	Pins•	Button eyes (I used 20mm black buttons with 4 holes)•	Black embroidery thread •	Twine (=packthread) to tie the bag on the head (or make the rope of chain stitches instead)HAVE FUN! :)

_source.title: CROCHET PATTERN, The Bowen Top Down Sweater, Women's Crochet Sweater Pattern, Crochet Pattern, Crochet, Pattern, Sweater
_source.description: PATTERN DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONSLog in to your Etsy account on the desktop site, NOT the app. Click on your profile photo and then on “purchases and reviews”. Tap the pattern. At the top of the receipt there will be a “download files” tab that you will click on to download the pattern.I would be happy to email you the pattern and/or answer any questions you might have. Please message me on Etsy or email me (rubywebbs@gmail.com). I am available 7 days/week between 5:00 AM - 6:00 PM US Central Standard Time.  Made with a size 3, soft cotton blend, the Bowen Pullover is light and airy and perfect for those cooler summer days and nights. Made with a size 3, cotton blend yarn, the sweater has a relaxed fit and can be made in five women’s sizes (xs, s, m, l, xl). Worked in a continuous round from the top down, you won’t find a single seam anywhere on this crochet sweater. Because this sweater is worked from the top down, it is very easy to adjust the length to your liking. Tuck it in or leave it untucked to show the bottom ribbing. Either way you can’t go wrong. Skill Level ~ INTERMEDIATE Crochet Terminology ~ US (pattern written in English) Yarn ~ DK, Size 3 (Yarn Bee Fresco Fiber, Lion Brand Coboo or Yarn Bee Bamboo-tiful)Hook  ~ US H/5 mm or hook needed to obtain gauge for making the sweater           -US G/4.25 mm - 4.5 mm for making the sleeve cuffSizing ~ Women's XS, S, M, L, and XL**If you have any questions at all with the pattern, do not hesitate to contact me through Etsy (www.rubywebbs.etsy.com) or by email (rubywebbs@gmail.com). I am always available to help if you get stuck on something in the pattern!The pattern and all photos within the pattern are protected under copyright and are the property of Ruby Webbs. Do not resell or share my pattern or photos.You have my permission to sell the finished product that you make from me this pattern. If selling online, please include a link back to my shop (www.rubywebbs.etsy.com). Thank you!

_source.title: Exclusive Unisex 90s Vintage Milwaukee Bucks Sweatshirt, Basketball Sweatshirt, Cream City Shirt, Boho Basketball Shirt, Vintage Sports
_source.description: This comfy sweatshirt is the perfect, roomy sweatshirt to celebrate football season! Some size down for a more fitted look.• 100% ring-spun cotton• Garment-dyed• Relaxed fitI absolutely love custom orders so feel free to message me with your vision and we can bring it to life! We can change up shirt colors, styles, and designs.
